creditline: Gift of Jeanne T. Hemphill, Stuart R. Hemphill, Scott A. Hemphill, and James T. Hemphill in memory of Ronda M. Hemphill
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: hide strip with linear beaded design with red and brown triangles and four radiating circular designs with crosses in blue, brown and red
inscription: Inscription; on back, in black: [LXX/ IXX (?)] and [9411 (?)/ LtX (?)]
title: Blanket Strip
